name: Mon Coeur❤
greetingText: I really like you a whole lot💕💋!!!
wishText: Many more years to you love! 🌹😉
textInChatBox:
Happy Birthday, mon coeur! 🎉❤️

On this special day, my heart beats just for you,
With love that's deep, sincere, and true.
May your day be filled with joy and delight,
With memories that shine ever so bright. 🌟

You're the melody to my song,
The place where I truly belong.
With every laugh and every smile,
You make my life worthwhile. 😊❤️

So here's to you, my love so dear,
Wishing you a birthday full of cheer!
May this year bring you all you desire,
With love that never seems to tire. 🎂💖

Happy Birthday, mon coeur! 🎉❤️
I love you more than words can say,
Today and every day! 😘❤️
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
